JobFullDesc: About the Role As a Program Manager for Product Planning, you’ll play a key role on our Global team, which equips Uber’s customer support network with resources and infrastructure to be successful! As Program Manager, you'll ensure that Community Operations, Uber’s support organization, collaborates with the Product Operations and Tech teams to integrate support insights into the product development and launch processes. In this role, you will be responsible for crafting and maintaining processes to facilitate our input to Product teams, working with a global community of Product-focused CommOps colleagues, and optimizing our engagement with Product teams and other stakeholders.What You’ll DoOptimize global CommOps processes to source, scope, and prioritize product requests from CommOps regional teamsBuild and manage relationships with key partners in CommOps, Product Ops and TechEstablish and coordinate a network of regional CommOps to ensure products are built with a customer centric lensPresent product insights to senior management in CommOps and Tech to drive business decisions and influence product roadmapTrack and find opportunities to improve CommOps contribution to product developmentLead global product launch processes for the global CommOps org (composed of 4 Mega Regions and multiple functional teams with different structures and tenures)Basic QualificationsMinimum 4 years of prior work experience in Project/Program Management and Product ManagementMinimum 5 years of professional experienceBA/BS DegreePreferred QualificationsSolid track record managing stakeholders and operating in a cross-functional environmentAn innovative, proactive, and passionate approach to your workAn ability to drive execution and implementation, beyond crafting what the right answer might beExperience leading insights/voice of the customer programsAbout the TeamCommunity Operations is pioneering how Uber manages customer and partner support around the globe. The team you will join has one mission: Make Customer Experience our #1 Competitive Advantage. You and your teammates will champion this mission every day until there are no doubts it’s a reality.
